rows.label: tev900292_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey, how's it going?
Up for a chat?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0020
rows.name:
NLA sure is a hive of activity.
I can't remember the last time I
was in such a bustling place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0030
rows.name:
Or when I last talked to a member
of another race, for that matter...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev900292_SEL0050
rows.name: Ask Neil about her past travels.

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0060
rows.name:
Well, as I told you before, I am an
archaeologist of cosmic civilizations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0070
rows.name:
I've traveled across many light-years,
and visited many star systems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0080
rows.name:
But since my work focuses on civilizations
that are, well...dead...I never really got the
chance to speak to many locals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0090
rows.name:
And tomb-raiding space pirates aren't
exactly the most skilled conversationalists.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0100
rows.name:
Speaking of tomb-raiding, ruins would
sometimes still be powered, and then
you'd trip their security measures...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0110
rows.name:
Traps designed to deter robbers,
autonomous defenses... I've had my
share of brushes with death![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0120
rows.name:
Oh, and one time, my ship broke down
and I had to spend a few months on a
deserted planet, bushwhacking...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0130
rows.name:
Compared to all that, this is basically
paradise. I really owe you guys my
thanks—aha ha ha ha ha...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_JNK0140
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev900292_SEL0150
rows.name: Ask Neil about the Qlu system.

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0160
rows.name:
Oh, you want to know about Qlu?
I'll be so happy to tell you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0170
rows.name:
You might think we're a bunch of recluses
and nepotists, but Qlu is actually a truly
wonderful star system![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0180
rows.name:
There's so much nature and so many
different ecosystems, and the climate is
so temperate and pleasant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0190
rows.name:
According to old Samaarian lore, we think
that the Qlu homeworld was the first
planet they settled on in this universe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0200
rows.name:
Oh, I wish you could see for yourself!
But sadly, Qlu now strictly forbids entry
to any outsiders...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0210
rows.name:
As a Qlurian myself, I wish I could do
something about that, but sadly it's quite
a deep-rooted issue...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_JNK0220
rows.name: Offer

rows.label: tev900292_SEL0230
rows.name: Suggest giving her a tour of NLA.

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0240
rows.name: Aww, are you trying to be a gentlehuman?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0250
rows.name:
Hmm... It would feel wrong to refuse,
though. We are friends, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0260
rows.name:
You know what—go on, then.
I'll take you up on that offer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0270
rows.name: I'm sure you'll be an excellent tour guide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_JNK0280
rows.name: Fuss

rows.label: tev900292_SEL0290
rows.name: Ask if there's anything she wants right now.

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0300
rows.name: Aww, are you trying to be a gentlehuman?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0310
rows.name:
Hmm... It would feel wrong to refuse,
though. We are friends, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0320
rows.name:
In that case, I would quite like to get my
hands on some pens and nice stationery.
I need to stock up for writing my poems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0330
rows.name:
Typing on my comm device is fine and all,
but it's only when I put pen to paper that
the best of my words come tumbling out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0340
rows.name:
Also, books, clothes, and indulgences...
Anything that could give me a better
understanding of Earth's culture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0350
rows.name:
...Oh dear. I've given you quite the
shopping list there, haven't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0360
rows.name:
You know what, why don't I just
leave it to your discretion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900292_MSG0370
rows.name:
What I want right now is whatever you're
in the mood for. How about that?[ST:wait ]
